title: Man Medium Dark Skin Tone Curly Hair
alsoKnownAs: Curly Haired Man Medium-Dark Skin Tone
description: Depicts a man with a medium-dark skin tone and curly hair. It's used to represent individuals with these features or to add diversity to representations of men.
apple_vendor_description: This distinguished man emoji on Apple devices showcases a rich, medium-dark skin tone brought to life with Apple’s signature glossy 3D shading and realistic lighting. His voluminous, curly hair is rendered with soft, rounded edges, creating a natural and dynamic texture that feels both tactile and sophisticated. The gentle smile and friendly gaze convey approachability and warmth, making him a versatile representation of a kind and approachable individual in digital conversations.
